definition: many stars/a vast sky full of stars
complicated/many/in great numbers/abbr. for 繁體|繁体[fan2 ti3], traditional form of Chinese characters
bright as a multitude of stars (idiom); extremely able talent
lit. whole sky, a multitude of stars

sentences.english: Some nice wooden houses like the stars drop on the edges of the fjord.
sentences.chinese: 漂亮的小木屋像点点繁星坠落在峡湾两翼。

sentences.english: Million account Qionglu drunk, shadow star shake and crumble.
sentences.chinese: 千军万帐中酣歌豪饮人早已醉，满天繁星摇摇欲坠。

sentences.english: I am quiet, she is humming, When the Stars Go Blue.
sentences.chinese: 我沉默不语，她时而叹息，此刻繁星也变得愁闷。

sentences.english: The sky was full of stars dancing and twinkling.
sentences.chinese: 夜空繁星点点，璀璨闪烁。

sentences.english: i'm so happy with you in this starry night.
sentences.chinese: 在这繁星闪灼的夜晚，跟你在一路很是欢愉。

sentences.english: With the lights of the city extinguished, stars shone brightly in the night sky.
sentences.chinese: 城市的灯光熄灭之际，夜空中闪烁着点点繁星。

sentences.english: The sky is filled with stars, invisible to day.
sentences.chinese: 天空却显出了白天所无的繁星。

sentences.english: This is the 4th volume of Kong Fan-xing's poems.
sentences.chinese: 这是孔繁星发表的第四本诗集。

sentences.english: Lonely at night to see the stars, it will let you feel the United States Jingye insipid.
sentences.chinese: 寂寞时看看夜晚的繁星，它会让你感觉静夜平淡的美。

sentences.english: The romance of a starlit night.
sentences.chinese: 在繁星点点的夏夜之浪漫中着迷。

sentences.english: The arc of the southern Milky Way shone brightly on this starry night.
sentences.chinese: 在这繁星闪耀的夜晚，南天银河弧明亮发光。

sentences.english: The heavy star is more and more clean, a beautiful night of parties.
sentences.chinese: 繁星越发皎洁，一派娇美的夜色。

sentences.english: I look at the stars in the sky, but still lost in your light and shadow.
sentences.chinese: 我仰望满天的繁星，却仍迷失在你的光和影。

sentences.english: Or shall the firefly offend the shininess of stars?
sentences.chinese: 萤火虫会触犯繁星闪闪吗？

sentences.english: Stars swim like gold fish far above the black arches.
sentences.chinese: 繁星好像金鱼在黑色拱门上高高处畅游。

sentences.english: Let me thing that there is one among those stars that guides my life through the dack unknown.
sentences.chinese: 让我设想一下，繁星中有一颗星，引导我的生命去。

definition: lit. whole sky, a multitude of stars
bright moon/refers to 夜明珠, a legendary pearl that can glow in the dark/CL:輪|轮[lun2]
